# frame(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the frame of the window is needed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func frame(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> CGRect
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGRectNull] if not implemented.
